attributes.action: Freedom Programme - compulsory for social workers, all court staff and judges.
attributes.additional_details:
Please make the Freedom Programme compulsory for social workers, all court staff and judges.
These people need awareness and understanding of domestic violence signals, dynamics and knowledge of the victim's responses to enable them to correctly be involved. At present they have no knowledge when involved in domestic violence cases. This is unprofessional and causes incorrect judgements and doesn't allow support or belief of domestic violence victims.
